tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct DATETIME(starttime,"HH","1h") as "Start Time",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("1d") and useraction.name="activate") as "Today",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("1d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("2d") and useraction.name="activate") as "1 Day Before",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("2d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("3d") and useraction.name="activate") as "2 Days Before",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("3d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("4d") and useraction.name="activate") as "3 Days Before",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("4d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("5d") and useraction.name="activate") as "4 Days Before",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("5d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("6d") and useraction.name="activate") as "5 Days Before",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("6d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("7d") and useraction.name="activate") as "6 Days Before",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("7d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("8d") and useraction.name="activate") as "7 Days Before" FROM usersession where stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}" and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "Today" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("1d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}" and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "1 Day Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("1d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("2d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}" and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "2 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("2d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("3d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}" and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "3 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("3d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("4d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}" and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "4 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("4d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("5d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}" and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "5 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("5d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("6d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}" and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "6 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("6d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("7d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}" and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "7 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("7d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("8d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}" and useraction.name="activate"
